windows.command: if (git remote | findstr 'github') { git remote set-url github https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git } else { git remote add github https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git }; git fetch github; git merge github/latest-release --allow-unrelated-histories

linux.command: git remote | grep github && git remote set-url github https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git || git remote add github https://github.com/Felipe-Cavalca/.github.git; git fetch github && git merge github/latest-release --allow-unrelated-histories
